mapper.select: SELECT SCI.INFO_ID, SCI.ID, SCI.IS_READ, SCI.USER_ID, SCI.CREATE_TIME, SCI.IS_DELETE, SCU.USER_TYPE, SCU.USER_NAME, SCUR.ROLE_NAME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER_INFO SCI LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER SCU ON SCI.USER_ID = SCU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER_ROLE SCUR ON SCU.USER_TYPE = SCUR.ROLE_ID WHERE SCI.IS_DELETE = 1

SELECT SCI.INFORMATION_ID, SCI.TARGET_USER_ID, SCI.INITIATE_USER_ID, SCI.CREATE_TIME, SCU.USER_TYPE, SCU.USER_NAME, SCUR.ROLE_NAME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_INFORMATION SCI LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER SCU ON SCI.INITIATE_USER_ID = SCU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER_ROLE SCUR ON SCU.USER_TYPE = SCUR.ROLE_ID WHERE SCI.IS_DELETE = 1
